parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game5</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version5</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game6</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version6</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets marker type. Marker type is a class name from [[CfgMarkers]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>'''Multiplayer optimisation:''' Global marker commands always broadcast the ''entire'' marker state over the network. As such, the number of network messages exchanged when creating or editing a marker can be reduced by performing all but the last operation using local marker commands, then using a global marker command for the last change (and subsequent global broadcast of all changes applied to the marker).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> markerName [[setMarkerType]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - See [[CfgMarkers]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerType]] "Warning";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[CfgMarkers]] [[setMarkerTypeLocal]] [[markerType]] [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]] [[setMarkerBrush]] [[setMarkerColor]] [[setMarkerDir]] [[setMarkerPos]] [[setMarkerShape]] [[setMarkerSize]] [[setMarkerText]] [[createMarker]]
</value></part></template>
